ygData.subject: Re: testeqnews.txt (Quasimeta)
ygData.msgSnippet: ... About damn time. I have been feedbacking and petitioning this every week or so. I am big on high efficiency and low downtime, as any bard should be.  We
ygData.messageBody:
>- If a party member goes link-dead, the remaining members
>will be notified. When the link-dead player returns, the group
>members will be notified as well.

About damn time.

I have been feedbacking and petitioning this every week or so.
I am big on high efficiency and low downtime, as any bard should
be. We are the party glue, and create a highly reliable/stable
grouping environment. When a player goes linkdead, the party
doesnt realize it and fumbles around a little. Buffs dont stick
to linkdead players, yet they still take mana as if it worked.
Every other game (including all the muds I've played on) had
some sort of message indicating the players 'link' status.

But with this improvement, watch out for our Accelerando song
to only take effect when you are swimming or in Neriak only.
And you must pat your head, and rub your drum on your tummy.
Even then you will have about 95% chance of missing the note.

Harmonic Distortion, 37th 'You have slain an ice giant'.
League of Antonican Bards, The Wind Spirit's Song
< Keepers of Norrath > Innoruuk
